snippet: Turning off Windows 8 multitouch gestures and turning off unused mailboxes in iOS 7’s mail app.
abstract: Personal Tech Q&A on turning off Windows 8 multitouch gestures and turning off unused mailboxes in iOS 7’s mail app; Tip of the Week notes Google brought back Pegman, little yellow fellow used to find available Street View photography on a Google map.
lead_paragraph: Turning off Windows 8 multitouch gestures and turning off unused mailboxes in iOS 7’s mail app.

headline.main: Getting Less Touchy on Windows 8, and Adjusting the iOS Mail App
